mainText:
Dear Apple Family,

Supporting, discussing, and promoting Apple products have been 
responsible for my livelihood for all of my professional career. But 
that's really a small part of why I owe Steve a great debt. We all owe 
Steve not because of what he's done for us in the past few years. We owe 
him because of what has happened the last 15 years at Apple will change 
our lives forever, or at least the next few hundred years.

I'm grateful to Steve personally and professionally. May God give grace 
and peace to you all during this time of mourning.
author: Shayne
